Subject: GRUB bootloader corruption after power loss
Description: System fails to boot after unexpected power loss. GRUB rescue prompt appears with 'unknown filesystem' error. Customer needs assistance recovering the bootloader.

Subject: Memory pressure causing OOM kills
Description: Production server experiencing frequent OOM kills despite having 64GB RAM. Multiple critical services being killed. Need to tune kernel memory parameters.

Subject: Systemd service dependency ordering issue
Description: Custom service fails to start on boot because it starts before its dependencies are ready. Adding After= directives has not resolved the issue.

Subject: Disk I/O performance degradation
Description: Customer reports significant disk I/O performance drop after kernel upgrade. iostat shows high await times. NVMe drives appear to be running in degraded mode.

Subject: SSH connection drops after 10 minutes
Description: All SSH connections to server drop exactly 10 minutes after establishing. TCPKeepAlive and ClientAliveInterval settings have been adjusted without success.

Subject: Package dependency conflicts blocking upgrade
Description: apt upgrade fails with unresolvable dependency conflicts. Multiple packages from third-party PPA are blocking the upgrade path.

Subject: Cron jobs not executing on schedule
Description: Scheduled cron jobs are not running at their specified times. cron daemon is running and crontab entries appear correct. No errors in syslog.
